name: Steam - Holiday Profile 2019
description: The Steam Holiday Profile 2019 is finally here on usertstyles.org! If you have missed the chance to get this profile, or you simply want to use this profile permanently, then here you have it! ❄️ Merry Xmas everyone! Feel free to share it with all your friends! [ Version: 5 | View change logs ]

user.name: Hyokkuda
user.about: I am a hardcore gamer, completionist, creative & perfectionist. I like various anime in the style of Dragon Ball Z, Bleach & Sword Art Online. I love spicy food & vanilla stuff! Also I'm a web stylist. I started off on a community website called Gaia Online with CSS and CSS3 style language. I continued working on websites and designs and now here I am. I am trying to make a living on making websites and web styles like theses. I do not force anyone on donating, but it is most appreciated. ♥

additional_info: IMPORTANT: For bug reports, please use Twitter and send me a tweet or a direct message with the link of your issue after posting it in the discussions down below! I'm asking you to do this because I don't receive any notifications when somebody is using the Discussions/Feedback button. I re-created this limited time profile theme for people who could not get their hands on it. Or simply because they did not want to waste their money on something that will disappear forever! I have included some new effects in this theme, such as blinking lights. The light strip you see dangling on the profile header is now animated! Please note that there is no snow falling on the profile at this time, but I can assure you that I am working on it! It is slightly tricky since I have to attach non-existing content(s) to existing content(s) for them to work. You can learn more about ::before and ::after pseudo-element here.
